titles: The Lord Chief Justice Herbert's account examin'd by W.A., Barrister at Law, ... ; wherein it is shewn that those authorities in law, whereby he would excuse his judgment in Sir Edward Hales his case, are very unfairly cited and as ill applied.
author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?
publisher: Printed for J. Robinson ... and Mat. Wotton ...,
notes: Attributed to W. Atwood. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Herbert, Edward, --  Sir, 1648?-1698. --  Short account of the authorities in law, upon E. Hales his case.
Dissenters, Religious --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Great Britain.
